Material used.Description: Recombinant wild-type and E46K mutant α-synuclein proteins were used in conjunction with phosphatidylcholine bilayers and gangliosides (GM3/GM1).

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Altered ion channel conductance and selectivity
Readout description.Result Description: E46K mutant formed channels with 50% lower conductance, increased cation selectivity, and asymmetrical voltage responses compared to wild-type. GM3 suppressed these effects, while GM1 had no effect.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Conductance > 10 pS (standard for wild-type α-synuclein channels)
